meanings.definition: A subatomic particle with the same mass as a neutron but with opposite charge.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the antineutron to understand its properties better.
meanings.sent2: The antineutron is an important component in nuclear physics experiments.
meanings.sent3: When the antineutron met the neutron at the subatomic party, they instantly repelled each other.
meanings.sent4: In the world of subatomic particles, the antineutron is like the mirror image of a neutron.
meanings.sent5: The antineutron's opposite charge to a neutron makes it a fascinating subject of research.
